quest.name: Tea Foretell
journal:
 Quest Sync
Mihsaja wishes to read the fate of a brave adventurer.
objectives: Gather spices to make chai tea.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: You have a look in your eyes I am well familiar with. You wish to see the threads of fate which guide you, yes? What if I told you they could be illuminated through the fine art of reading chai tea?

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: Yes, the last remnant of a cup of tea can show your fate, the leaves and spices in the cup spelling out a message for those who can read it. This art has been perfected over generations in Thavnair, and I am willing to share it with you. Are you willing to take my gift?

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: Splendid! Before we begin, however, you must gather the spices we will use with your own hands. It's the only way to attune the tea to your destiny.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: I have marked on your map a location where you can harvest three different spices. You will choose two of these, and do not make this choice lightly─it may very well decide the course of your future.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The fortune-teller wrote that the Thavnairian bay leaf improves the workings of the stomach, preventing discomfort and embarrassing irregularities in the gut.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The fortune-teller wrote that the root of the singabera raises body temperature to expel toxins and other harmful substances from the body.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The fortune-teller wrote that the talisman needleleaf dispels negative thoughts, bringing a sense of calm to those who consume them.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: You have returned with the spices, I see. You hold your future in your hands. Now, give them to me, and I shall brew a tea you are not soon to forget.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: And here you are. This tea will decide your destiny, but that doesn't mean it cannot be delicious as well. I hope I don't have to convince you to drink until the final drop.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: See? Delicious, yes? Now, pass the cup to me, and I will read your fate.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: There is a great revelation ahead of you. A revelation that involves the gods themselves. What will you learn? How will it change you? The tea does not say.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: Oh, you will have an unexpected reunion with someone from your past. Will it be a lover, friend, family, or an erstwhile comrade-in-arms? The tea does not say, but it shall surely become a pivot on which your destiny turns.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: Oh hoho, there is great wealth in store for you, but only if you make the right choices. Lay down your weapons and pick up a map and tools─the trade will be well worth it.

dialogue.name: MIHSAJA
dialogue.text: Well, how does it feel? A glimpse of foresight is often an enlightening experience, and I hope that my humble skills can dispel doubt in the days ahead. Thank you for giving me the chance to hone my craft further.
